header.title: Hi, I am Tamas.
header.subtitle: I am a self-taught developer who is looking for his first full-time front-end position.

description.paragraph: My undergrad programme revolved around HTML, CSS and JS back in the late 2000s, and while I continued my grad programme with a social/political science angle and later worked as a teacher, my interest in web development never wavered.
In 2019, I refreshed my HTML, CSS and JS knowledge and continued with learning React and its ecosystem. I completed the Udacity FrontEnd NanoDegree programme in early 2020.
I have spent this last year building projects small and big to expand my knowledge in various directions.
